items.title: Crypt of the Minotaur
items.description: Sample game made for Ludum Dare 33. Play as the Minotaur to defend your treasure!

items.title: Sweep Stacks
items.description: This game was created for Ludum Dare 31. Sweep across the screen to clear blocks!

items.description: This is a sample clone of the popular mobile game flappy bird.

items.description: Sample game made for Ludum Dare 29. Play as a Kraken and destroy ships!

items.description: This is an example of how to create a Shoot 'Em Up game

items.title: Breakout
